original_text: Now when the apostles at Jerusalem heard that Samaria had received the word of God, they sent to them Peter and John,
korean_text: 예루살렘에 있는 사도들이 사마리아도 하나님의 말씀을 받았다 함을 듣고 베드로와 요한을 보내매

sentences.original_text: Now when the apostles at Jerusalem heard
sentences.korean_translation: 그때 예루살렘에 있는 사도들이 들었을 때

sentences.original_text: that Samaria had received the word of God,
they sent to them Peter and John,
